Class SingleTrashLineAction

java.lang.Object
application.model.action.SingleTrashLineAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameAction
public class SingleTrashLineAction extends Object implements GameAction
A boss attack that inserts one trash line at the bottom of the Tetris board. A trash line is a fully occupied row with one random gap column.

Implements GameAction â€” when the boss calls chooseAttack().execute(board), this action adds 1 trash line. The board handles the actual row insertion.

    • execute

      public void execute(Board board)
      Executes this action on the given game board. The concrete implementation determines the effect (e.g., adding trash lines, shuffling rows, etc.). Adds 1 trash line to the bottom of the board.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
